channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In seconds, AI builds proteins to battle cancer and antibiotic resistance
item.description: Artificial intelligence is now designing custom proteins in seconds—a process that once took years—paving the way for cures to diseases like cancer an...

item.title: Brighter, bolder, hotter: Why female guppies can't resist orange

item.title: Lemurs age without inflammation—and it could change human health forever
item.description: What if humans didn’t have to suffer the slow-burning fire of chronic inflammation as we age? A surprising study on two types of lemurs found no evide...

item.title: Lasers capture the invisible dance of wind and waves
